overview: Inside every horny housewife, there's a seductive wildcat ready to grab the world by the balls. And that's just what Judith intends to do. After watching her husband, Patrick, thrust his throbbing body against luscious Luana and voluptuous Victoria, Judith decides she's had enough. Wasting no time, she seduces her best friend's husband. And that's not all. Judith wants to be everyone's special toy. So, get ready. Tonight, it's your turn to be Seduced.
title: Seduced
